media:group.media:title: Top 20 Smartest Movie Villains
media:group.media:description:
Tenting your fingers and cackling is an art form! For this list, we’ll be looking at the most dastardly and intelligent big screen villains of all time. Since we’re talking general plotlines, we’re issuing a spoiler warning. Our countdown includes villains Auric Goldfinger, Professor Moriarty, Helmut Zemo and much more! Which of these villains do you find the cleverest? Is there someone we missed? Share your thoughts in the comments!
